item.title: BSc Computer Science degree
item.description: The BSc Computer Science degrees are designed to give a strong foundation in Computer Science and specialised knowledge of topics such as Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Gaming and Web Development. The programmes are structured into three levels, so youâ€™ll need to attend them in order to gain the equivaent of BSc in Computer Science.
